AFC11 Division 2 - aetiology - 4th as medic/scout
AFC12 Division 2 - sapnu puas - 3rd as scout
AFC13 Division 1 - sapnu puas - 4th as scout
AFC14 Division 2 - Bokorimon - 1st as sub
AFC15 Division 1 - Waraimon - 5th as sub

OZF18 Open - winnie the pooh watersports - 3rd as scout
OZF19 Intermediate - Ripe Strategy - 4th as scout

players.name: kenji
players.description:
![bottom text][1]


  [1]: https://f4.bcbits.com/img/0003436699_10.jpg
The only thing I remember is kenji being decent 4 seasons ago and then he started playing with brain dead players like bumble which ultimately made him drop down to bumbles level maybe even lower. He is now battling mid main when he could of been battling mid inter smh

---

#### Match Info

This match is to be played between **Sunday the 30th of January** and **Thursday the 3rd of February 2021**. 
Your division administrator is **a team of ants in their prime** (`a team of ants in their prime#3881`).

#### Reminders

 - During OZF 33 we plan on conducting random demo checks to ensure players are recording demos. **Please ensure that you are recording match demos in order to avoid punishment.** 
 - Transfers will continue to be completed on a bi-weekly basis referred to as "Transfer Windows". This system will allow those reviewing them more time to review and accept transfers. Please refer to the [Transfer Window page here for more information](<https://ozfortress.com/forums/threads/776>).
 - If you are unsure on whether or not something is considered a game exploit, **contact a League Administrator for clarification. Ignorance is not an excuse.**

**Upper Page Playoffs**

To be played between **Sunday the 20th of March** and **Thursday the 24th of March 2022**.

Maps for playoff matches are selected by the captains of each team prior to the game starting.

The selection process:

1. The higher seeded or home team will either choose to ban first or defer.
2. The first team (determined by the result of step one) will ban a map.
3. The second team will ban a map.
4. The first team will ban a map.
5. The second team will ban a map.
6. The first team will select the first map from the remaining pool.
7. The second team will select the second map from the remaining pool.
8. The first team will select the tiebreaker map from the remaining maps.

**Semi-Final**

To be played between **Sunday the 27th of March** and **Thursday the 31st of March 2022**.

Maps for playoff matches are selected by the captains of each team prior to the game starting.

The selection process:

1. The higher seeded or home team will either choose to ban first or defer.
2. The first team (determined by the result of step one) will ban a map.
3. The second team will ban a map.
4. The first team will ban a map.
5. The second team will ban a map.
6. The first team will select the first map from the remaining pool.
7. The second team will select the second map from the remaining pool.
8. The first team will select the tiebreaker map from the remaining maps.
